channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources
channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading

item.title: OpenAI says you can trust ChatGPT answers, as it kicks off ads rollout preparation
item.description: OpenAI previously confirmed that it's testing ads in ChatGPT for free and $8 Go accounts, and now we're seeing early signs of that rollout, at least on Android. [...]...
item.dc:creator: Bleeping Computer

item.title: OpenAI is retiring famous GPT-4o model, says GPT 5.2 is good enough
item.description: OpenAI has confirmed that it's retiring ChatGPT's most popular model called GPT-4o and several other models, including GPT-5 Instant, GPT-5 Thinking, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and o4-mini. [...]...
item.dc:creator: Bleeping Computer

item.title: U.S. convicts ex-Google engineer for sending AI tech data to China
item.description: A U.S. federal jury has convicted Linwei Ding, a former software engineer at Google, for stealing AI supercomputer data from his employer and secretly sharing it with Chinese tech firms. [...]...
item.dc:creator: Bleeping Computer
